value.title: Download PBIX reports - Minute Monday
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can download a PBIX (Power BI Desktop file) from the Power BI service for a given report. Reports have to have been published after November 24. 2016 for the feature to be available. This does work with Live or DirectQuery reports.  Ginger Grant's Blog talking about

value.title: Filter Power BI reports using a URL query string
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how to filter Power BI reports, within the Power BI service, using a URL query string. value.title: How the Power BI Data Region is selected
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft

value.title: INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground (2021)
value.excerpt: Want to try things out with Power BI Embedded? Want to explore the JavaScript API? Try embedding with your own report? Then you need to check out the INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground! Amit Shuster walks us through the revamp.  Blog Announcement: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-the-new-power-bi-embedded-analytics-playground-preview/

value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports.  This will get you started with

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names! value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can use Active Directory custom attributes for the user lookup with the Power BI Gateway. This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections.  Manage your data source - Analysis Services https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-enterprise-manage-ssas#usernames-with-analysis-services
